sentence: Last week, Trump traveled to Georgia to rally support for his two Republican picks: Herschel Walker and David Perdue.
author: Alexandra Hutzler
title: How to Watch Trump Michigan Rally: Time, Live Stream for GOP Event

sentence: He also predicted that a Kemp win would negatively affect the great Herschel Walkers race for the Senate it will be very hard for him to win with Kemp on the ticket.? Dont let the Democrats, or the RINOs win in Georgia.
author: Hannah Bleau
title: Donald Trump: Georgia Debate a BIG Win for Perdue, Exposed Brian Kemp as RINO
